alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 1:31PM CDT until October 04 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COLLINGSWORTH AND NORTHEASTERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Lelia Lake, or 11 miles northeast of Clarendon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dozier, Lutie, Lelia Lake, Quail, and Samnorwood. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
